result.eng: What is wrong with your left foot?
result.ga: Cad atá cearr leis an chos chlé agat
result.orig: Cad atá cearr leis an chos chlé agat
result.html: Cad atá cearr leis an chos chlé agatWhat is wrong with your left foot?
result.ponchtml: Cad atá cearr leis an ċos ċlé agatWhat is wrong with your left foot?

result.eng: He was hurt in the leg.
result.html: Goineadh sa chos éHe was hurt in the leg.
result.ponchtml: Goineaḋ sa ċos éHe was hurt in the leg.

result.eng: Their legs were splashing about in the cool water.
result.ga: Bhí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuair
result.orig: Bhí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuair
result.html: Bhí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuairTheir legs were splashing about in the cool water.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuairTheir legs were splashing about in the cool water.

result.eng: The horse was scratching his foot on the floor.
result.ga: Bhí an capall ag tochas a chos ar an urlár
result.orig: Bhí an capall ag tochas a chos ar an urlár
result.html: Bhí an capall ag tochas a chos ar an urlárThe horse was scratching his foot on the floor.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an capall ag toċas a ċos ar an urlárThe horse was scratching his foot on the floor.

result.eng: The day I was set free I felt happy.
result.ga: An lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo chroí
result.orig: An lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo chroí
result.html: An lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo chroíThe day I was set free I felt happy.
result.ponchtml: An lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo ċroíThe day I was set free I felt happy.

result.eng: He was one foot in the grave.
result.ga: Bhí cos amuigh is cos istigh san uaigh aige
result.orig: Bhí cos amuigh is cos istigh san uaigh aige
result.html: Bhí cos amuigh is cos istigh san uaigh aigeHe was one foot in the grave.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cos amuiġ is cos istiġ san uaiġ aigeHe was one foot in the grave.
